title: Match Bases
text: With all terms containing same log base, the log can be removed, so it becomes $$x^2+3=4x$$. Solve for x.

title: Solve for x
text: We can simplify into $$x^2-4x+3=0$$ and solve for x. We can factor the quadratic get $$\left(x-1\right) \left(x-3\right)=0$$ which have $$x=1$$ or $$x=3$$ as solutions.

title: Check for Constrains
text: Given $$\log_{a}\left(b\right)$$, b can not be negative. Both 1 and 3 are non negative. Therefore $$x=1$$ and $$x=3$$ are solutions for this equation.
